channel.title: Help Please (I think its 317 client and server)
channel.description: ok i really need to know how to add new npc's to my server. i would like the tormented demons and all the godwars npc's if possible also i already know how to add new items but could anyone please give me the models for dragon boots, amulet of fury, fire cape or attack cape, vesta's longsword, and any godsword if you can get me any of these models it would be greatly appreciated. also if you can please tell me how to add the proper sara sword (not gs) and d claws spec please thank you

item.title: Help Please (I think its 317 client and server)
item.dc:creator: @grundyboy34 grundyboy34
item.description:
@grundyboy34 wrote:

thank you ill be sure to try
also i have 48086 models through i model grabber so i have all the new stuff
but i have no idea wat numbers correspond to wat item
if there is a list out there of model codes could someone please post it
thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please (I think its 317 client and server)

item.title: Help Please (I think its 317 client and server)
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

Jc22493:

This should be in the client help section.

Now it is.

[quote=“grundyboy34, post:1, topic:291030”]ok i really need to know how to add new npc’s to my server.
i would like the tormented demons and all the godwars npc’s if possible
also i already know how to add new items but could anyone please give me the models for dragon boots, amulet of fury,
fire cape or attack cape, vesta’s longsword, and any godsword
if you can get me any of these models it would be greatly appreciated.
also if you can please tell me how to add the proper sara sword (not gs) and d claws spec please
thank you[/quote]

NPCs: Class5.java I believe for the ints. Add the npc models to your models folder.

Read full topic
